overloaded_restaurant.description: Driver is near SpiceCorner. Merchant reports a 40-minute prep time; customer expects 20 minutes. What should be done?

damaged_packaging.description: Customer reports that soup container is leaking; merchant denies responsibility.

recipient_unavailable.description: Driver arrives at destination, but recipient is not available to receive the package.

traffic_obstruction.description: Passenger is on the way to the airport. A major accident is detected along the planned route.
